name: quiqr
description: Local-first CMS for static files and engines like Quarto or Hugo SSG

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules dist build packages/frontend/node_modules packages/frontend/dist packages/frontend/build packages/types/node_modules packages/types/dist packages/types/build packages/backend/node_modules packages/backend/dist packages/backend/build packages/adapters/electron/node_modules packages/adapters/electron/dist packages/adapters/electron/build packages/adapters/standalone/node_modules packages/adapters/standalone/dist packages/adapters/standalone/build packages/types/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo packages/backend/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo packages/frontend/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo packages/adapters/electron/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo packages/adapters/standalone/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "types,backend,adapter,frontend,electron" -c "blue,magenta,cyan,green,yellow" "npm run dev -w @quiqr/types" "npm run dev -w @quiqr/backend" "npm run dev -w @quiqr/adapter-electron" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:electron:wait"
scripts.dev:backend:standalone: concurrently --names "types,backend,standalone,server" -c "blue,magenta,cyan,green" "npm run dev -w @quiqr/types" "npm run dev -w @quiqr/backend" "npm run dev -w @quiqr/adapter-standalone" "npm run dev:start -w @quiqr/adapter-standalone"
scripts.start:backend:standalone: npm run build -w @quiqr/types && npm run build -w @quiqr/backend && npm run build -w @quiqr/adapter-standalone && npm run start -w @quiqr/adapter-standalone
scripts.build: npm run _build_info && npm run build:packages && npm run _pack_embgit && electron-forge make
scripts.build:appimage: npm run _build_info && npm run build:packages && npm run _pack_embgit && electron-forge make --targets=@reforged/maker-appimage
scripts.build:rpm: npm run _build_info && npm run build:packages && npm run _pack_embgit && electron-forge make --targets=@electron-forge/maker-rpm
scripts.build:windows: npm run _build_info && npm run build:packages && npm run _pack_embgit && electron-forge make --targets=@electron-forge/maker-squirrel
scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w @quiqr/types && npm run build -w @quiqr/backend && npm run build -w @quiqr/adapter-electron && npm run build -w @quiqr/adapter-standalone && npm run build -w @quiqr/frontend
scripts.package: npm run _build_info && npm run build:packages && npm run _pack_embgit && electron-forge package
scripts.make: npm run _build_info && npm run build:packages && npm run _pack_embgit && electron-forge make
scripts.make:deb: npm run _build_info && npm run build:packages && npm run _pack_embgit && electron-forge make --targets=@electron-forge/maker-deb
scripts.publish: npm run _build_info && npm run build:packages && npm run _pack_embgit && electron-forge publish
